Question: In early 2005, this person visited the parents in the Terri Schiavo case; he supported their unsuccessful bid to keep her alive.
Hints: This person was also the host of Both Sides with This person on CNN from 1992 to 2000.
Clinton awarded this person the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation's highest honor bestowed on civilians in August 2000.
While attending A&T, this person played quarterback and was elected student body president.
